metadata.title: Japan/East Sea Dynamics using Numerical Models with 1/8 to 1/64 Degree Resolution

creators.name: U.S. Navy, Office of Naval Research
Gregg Jacobs of Naval Research Laboratory, Stennis Space Center, MS.

metadata.description: To investigate Japan/East Sea dynamics in a systematic and progressive fashion using a sequence of increasingly complex ocean models and model-data comparisons.
metadata.notes:
